website_summaries.verdict: 20-inch five-spoke mag wheel with a retro aesthetic.
pros: Purchasers love the styling of this wheel, which fits the BMX look
Flexible enough for all kinds of biking, including freestyle and dirt racing
cons: Doesn't come with anything in the middle of the wheel to attach to the bike frame

customer_reviews.title: Yes Yes Yes this rim is amazing came when it was said to come
customer_reviews.text: Yes Yes Yes this rim is amazing came when it was said to come, it looks really nice with my bike I'm getting the rear wheel also because right now I have a spoke rim in the back and a mag in the front can't wait to get the rear one
customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Overall it is a very good wheel. I’m giving it 4 out of 5 stars only because the ACS logo could be better placed. The logo is printed on the area where the brake pad will make contact with the wheel. Eventually the brake pad will act as an eraser and make the logo disappear. Otherwise, still a good quality and good looking wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Falcon

customer_reviews.title: ... restore my 1984 Dyno Compe for my kids - perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Used to restore my 1984 Dyno Compe for my kids - perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: JustLiftTheWeights

customer_reviews.title: Great Wheels
customer_reviews.text: I changed my wheels from white to black. They fit great and look good.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Nice wheel, but rim quickly gets altered by the ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice wheel, but rim quickly gets altered by the application of brakes. My girlfriend's 12-year old son was extremely happy with the transformation of his POS garage sale find to totally blacked-out BMX bike.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade to sons bike
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old loves them. Look good and appear to be quality.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great wheels and exactly what I wanted / expected !
customer_reviews.author: Eric Colvin

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for a project I was working on.
customer_reviews.author: PopoGuru

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for BMX mag wheels
customer_reviews.text: What a clean, mean look! Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Millard Charles

customer_reviews.title: falls advertising about the TIRE being with the wheel.
customer_reviews.text: I received this item today it said it came with wheel and tire but has no tire with them.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Forsgren

product_meta.title: ACS Mag 5-Spoke Front Wheel, Black
product_meta.description: Hub/Brake Compatibility: Rim Brake the valve used is standard schrader. The Rim material is plastic.This product is manufactured in Taiwan.
feature_bullets: 20 Inches (Including the wheel and the Tire)
